# Third-Party Licenses

This directory contains license files for third-party software used by OCloud.

## Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Go SDK

- **Package**: github.com/oracle/oci-go-sdk/v65
- **License**: Dual-licensed under UPL-1.0 or Apache-2.0 (you may choose either)
- **Copyright**: Copyright (c) 2016, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates
- **License File**: [oracle-oci-go-sdk/LICENSE.txt](oracle-oci-go-sdk/LICENSE.txt)
- **Source**: https://github.com/oracle/oci-go-sdk

## Other Dependencies

For a complete list of all dependencies and their versions, see the root `go.mod` file.

Most other dependencies used by OCloud are licensed under permissive open source licenses (MIT, Apache-2.0, BSD-3-Clause).

## License Compliance

OCloud itself is licensed under the MIT License (see root LICENSE file).

This project complies with all third-party license requirements by:
1. Preserving original copyright notices
2. Including the complete license text for dependencies
3. Providing attribution in the NOTICE file

For more information, see the NOTICE file in the root directory.
